WorkItem.Description: I'm not sure this is an issue - it may be something I missed in patch 3.3, and if so I apologize. It just seems odd to me that suddenly Berserking has taken a nosedive for me in DPS value, and every single weapon currently has Mongoose recommended instead. What makes me think this may be an issue is that I've tried replacing an item or two to go back to the configuration I had when Berserking was recommended, and Mongoose still shows top of the list now, so it doesn't seem that I've reached some turning-point threshold.

Comments.Message:
I have the exact same issue. It seems to be an idol issue. With either Idol of Mutilation or Idol of the Crying Moon equipped the main hand enchant scores go all over the map and are incorrect. All other idols seems to work fine. Also, unequipping the idol works too.

Idol of Mutilation and Idol of the Crying moon seem to be bugged.

I have the exact same issue. It seems to be an idol issue. With either Idol of Mutilation or Idol of the Crying Moon equipped the main hand enchant scores go all over the map and are incorrect. All other idols seems to work fine. Also, unequipping the idol works too.

Idol of Mutilation and Idol of the Crying moon seem to be bugged.
There's something wrong with proc'd agility being overvalued. We're working on it.
If it's all proc'd agility, I guess it includes trinkets like DM:G / DC / DW as well?
This was fixed in 2.3.5. It only affected agi procs with durations longer than their cooldown.
